sentences.en: A delegate instance may encapsulate either static or instance method.
sentences.cn: 委托实例可以封装静态或实例方法.

sentences.en: Abstract base classes are quite elegant to encapsulate calling conventions.
sentences.cn: 抽象基类很优雅的封装调用请求.

sentences.en: Cannot Encapsulate data when the page is being browsed.
sentences.cn: 当浏览数据页时,无法封装数据.

sentences.en: Containers are objects that encapsulate and track zero or more components.
sentences.cn: 容器是封装和跟踪零个或更多个组件的对象.

sentences.en: Delegates constructed with a named method can encapsulate either a static method or an instance method.
sentences.cn: 使用命名方法构造的委托可以封装静态方法或实例方法.

sentences.en: In particular , there are standard smart pointer classes designed to encapsulate COM interface pointers.
sentences.cn: 通常情况下, 我们有专门封装COM接口指针的的标准智能指针类.

sentences.en: In this application, the carrier is used to encapsulate the grid.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下, 要用载体把格栅密封起来.

sentences.en: It may be desirable to encapsulate larger sequences of commands.
sentences.cn: 存在着封装更大规模的命令序列的需求.

sentences.en: Methods encapsulate the functionality of a component in the same object where the data resides.
sentences.cn: 方法在数据存放的同一对象内封装为组件的功能.

sentences.en: On the Refactor menu, click Encapsulate Field.
sentences.cn: 在“重构”菜单上单击“封装字段”.

sentences.en: The Encapsulate Field dialog box appears.
sentences.cn: 随即出现“封装字段”对话框.

sentences.en: The tags and scriptlets encapsulate the business logic on the HTML page.
sentences.cn: 标记和scriptlets把 商业逻辑过程封装在html页面内.

sentences.en: The words of the song neatly encapsulate the mood of the country at that time.
sentences.cn: 这首歌的歌词言简意赅地表现出国家当时的氛围。

sentences.en: Use a factory implementation to encapsulate mechanisms for caching and reusing objects.
sentences.cn: 使用工厂实现封装缓存和重用对象的机制.

sentences.en: We use classes to encapsulate algorithms and data storage.
sentences.cn: 我们用类封装算法和存储数据.

sentences.en: With these custom tags, you can encapsulate even most sophisticated Java code into lightweight JSP tags.
sentences.cn: 利用这些标签, 你可以把大部分复杂的Java代码封装到轻便的JSP标签里.

words.tran_cn: 压缩；将…装入胶囊；将…封进内部

trans.tran_en: to express or show something in a short way
to express or show something in a short way
